articles.author: Ava Wallace
articles.title: Stephanie White hired to guide Indiana Fever, Caitlin Clark to next step - The Washington Post
articles.description: Stephanie White is returning to the Indiana Fever as head coach, tasked with developing young stars and managing high expectations.
articles.content: The Indiana Fever are bringing back a familiar face to coach Caitlin Clark and one of the most talented young rosters in the WNBA. The team named Stephanie White its coach Friday, filling the short-l… [+376 chars]
